Dialogue.Page: Mod: Powerfail Authors: T3rtu, Vodblink, Solec, HeroPlays1122
Powerfail is a mod made for the fifth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. It takes place in a planetary system with a gas giant in the center.
This team in particular was pretty new to Outer Wilds Modding and it surprisingly has somewhat of a story and some puzzles to solve.
